HomePage.first-paragraph: Established in 2015 by Ufuk Enerji Elektrik Üretim A.Ş in the districts of Kepsut and Susurluk in Balıkesir, the Poyrazgölü Wind Power Plant is an energy production facility that aims to contribute to Turkey's energy supply security while prioritizing environmental sustainability. With an installed capacity of 48.5 MWe and 21 wind turbines, Poyrazgölü WPP is a significant project in renewable energy and plays a key role in meeting our country’s clean energy needs.
HomePage.second-paragraph: Equipped with a total of 17 x 2.3 MW and 4 x 2.35 MW modern turbines, the Poyrazgölü Wind Power Plant has an annual energy production capacity that can meet the energy needs of hundreds of thousands of households. By generating electricity from renewable energy sources, our plant helps reduce carbon emissions and represents an important step toward achieving our sustainable energy goals.
HomePage.card1-description: Wind energy is a zero-emission energy source. It provides environmentally friendly energy production by reducing carbon emissions and contributes to a sustainable future.
HomePage.card2-description: Renewable wind energy reduces costs in the long run and decreases dependency on energy imports, offering an economical energy solution for countries.
HomePage.card3-description: Modern wind turbines operate with high efficiency, generating energy even at low wind speeds, thereby maximizing energy production potential.
HomePage.card4-description: Wind is an unlimited and renewable energy source. It contributes to sustainable energy production by preserving natural resources.

AboutUsPage.card1-description: To become Turkey's most reliable energy production company by leading in the field of renewable energy sources, offering sustainable and environmentally friendly energy solutions.
AboutUsPage.card2-description: To contribute to energy security and customer satisfaction through clean energy production processes equipped with innovative technologies that respect both society and nature.
AboutUsPage.card3-description: To offer innovative and sustainable solutions in the industry by generating energy with maximum efficiency from renewable sources like wind energy, supported by our expert team and advanced technologies.
AboutUsPage.card4-description: We analyze our customers' energy needs accurately and provide environmentally conscious solutions. We build our relationships on the principles of trust, transparency, and responsibility, contributing to social responsibility projects and prioritizing sustainability while ensuring access to energy.
AboutUsPage.card5-description: In renewable energy production, we aim to offer society the highest quality and efficiency in energy through continuous improvement and innovation.
AboutUsPage.card6-description: We make a difference in the energy sector by developing innovative solutions that are sustainable and environmentally friendly, meeting the energy needs of our customers.
AboutUsPage.first: Established in 2015 by Ufuk Enerji Elektrik Üretim A.Ş., the Poyrazgölü Wind Power Plant (WPP) operates in the districts of Kepsut and Susurluk in Balıkesir, aiming to strengthen Turkey’s energy supply security through renewable energy sources. With an installed capacity of 48.5 MWe and 21 state-of-the-art turbines, Poyrazgölü WPP plays a pioneering role in Turkey's clean energy production, advancing environmental sustainability and supporting the country’s green energy transition. This facility contributes to reducing Turkey’s dependency on external energy sources by diversifying its energy mix with electricity generated from natural resources.
AboutUsPage.second: Equipped with high-capacity turbines, including 17 x 2.3 MW and 4 x 2.35 MW units, Poyrazgölü WPP has an annual energy production capacity sufficient to meet the needs of hundreds of thousands of households. By generating electricity from renewable sources, our plant significantly reduces carbon emissions, offering an eco-friendly energy solution aligned with our sustainable development goals. Ufuk Enerji is committed to contributing to Turkey's climate-friendly energy vision while adopting an innovative and environmentally conscious approach, setting a benchmark in the energy sector and driving progress within the industry.
